attributes.action: NO! to EU Defense, NO! to EU Unification
attributes.additional_details:
Selling or giving our defense over to EU is not in the best interest for Britain or the British people.
It removes control away from Britain and puts national security second to EU interests.
It is not Sovran, it is not taking back control and puts Britain at risk.
attributes.background:
Britain must have it's own defense, separate from EU, including R&D, Build, Training to Control.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ajV7-_XKlLM

rejection.details:
It is not clear what you are asking the Government to do.

The UK already has its own defence arrangements that are separate from the EU:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-defence/about

The UK co-operates with the EU primarily through the Common Security and Defence Policy, and the UK defence mandate published in February 2020 states that the UK will "consider participation" in EU defence programmes if that is in the UK's interest.

This link contains further information about UK defence policy and Brexit:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/publications/research/eu-referendum/defence-security-and-immigration/#jump-link-0
